note: Get coins from the Scavenger Enchant
guide: Put the Scavenger Enchantment on
your weapon and kill mobs.
You will progress in this passively.
Obtained from Killing Lost Adventurers,
Redstone Warriors, sacrificing items
like Ender Gear to the Draconic Altar,
or salvaging Dragon Armor Pieces.
This counts every Crop broken by you
so crops like Sugar Cane and Cactus
progress faster.
Use SkyHanni's Trapper features to make this easier.
Use /warp trapper to get back to Trevor
Kill the Goblins you can find in the Dwarven Mines.
You will need Mining 12 for this.
You will most likely get this passively.
Use /be ingame to view your progress.
You can visit all Islands by using /warp.
This will open the fast travel menu.
The Hub, Spider's Den, The End,
Gold Mine, Deep Caverns and Farming Isles
Obtained from Anita for 1 Gold Medal
and 32 Jacob Tickets. You can trade lower
medals into higher ones with Anita.
1 gold is 4 silver or 8 bronze.
Those medals will supply the tickets.
Reforge your Void Sword to Sharp
at the Blacksmith in the Hub (-28 69 -125),
or enchant any weapon with Critical 5 (50 Levels).
Kill farm animals in the Barn with a Cleaver
with Cleave 5 and Sharpness 5
or spiders in Arachne's Burrow (-309 92 -209)
in the Spider's Den with a Dreadlord Sword.
You will most likely get this from
leveling up skills.
Remember to actually put the money
you get in the Bank :)
This requires Raw Fish Collection 5.
You should place down fishing minions
with medium storages to help with this.
Alchemy 18 is a total of 222.425 XP.
This can be done using enchanted gold
or enchanted sugar (cane)
Those pieces are dropped from Lapis Zombies
in the Deep Caverns. They have a 1% base chance
to drop, so its recommended to enchant your
weapon with looting and luck.
Buy a Raider Axe for 130k coins
from the Melancholic Viking in The Park.
Remember: Level 1 Enchantments do count.

note: Equip a Common or higher tiered Rock Pet
guide: You get the Rock Pet from mining ores.
The Common Rock unlocks at 2.5k broken ores.
Amethyst: Jungle key and Temple Run,
Jade: Divan Mines and find all the items,
Amber: Find King, give him 3 goblin eggs and find the Queen,
Sapphire: 6 different Robot Parts, give them to Professor Robot,
Topaz: Kill the Bal and get the crystal after it dies
After obtaining all those crystals, place them
in the Nucleus to complete this.
§cDo not leave the lobby if u placed 1+ Crystals
§cbefore finishing the run!
Unlocks at Diamond Collection 6 (5k).
Costs 1 Enchanted Diamond and 8 Vines
(costs 40 Jungle Leaves, needs Jungle Wood Collection 4
to unlock in the /trades .

note: Kill 25 Goblins during a Goblin Raid
guide: Kill Goblins in the Goblin Burrows (-100 163 150)
while that event is going on.
You need Mining Level 12 to go there.
You will need Combat 15 and a completion
of the previous floor for this.
This gets a lot easier if you get help
from other players.

note: Silver or higher Medal in a Farming Contest
guide: For this you have to speak to Jacob
and be Farming Level 10 to participate.
Check the Calendar after that to see
upcoming contests. Getting an Advanced Gardening Hoe
might be helpful for this (25 Copper).
This will progress towards the Blueprint Goal.
Unlock Fishing Minions (50 Raw Fish),
buy Fish from the Fish Merchant in The Hub,
craft as many minions as you can, give them
the best fuel and storage that you have.
Don't forget to collect them in time.
This unlocks at 2.5k Raw Porkchop
Collection and costs 40 Enchanted Pork
and a chest to craft. Using Minions
will make this easier give them
the best fuel and storage that you have.
Don't forget to collect them in time.
Killing Mobs in The Barn with a Cleaver
will also help you getting the material.
You can drop this from Dungeon Chests.
It has a low chance of 0.75% to drop
in the free Chest, so make sure to
have some money ready for this.
Buy all 6 Talismans for 26k
from the Adventurer in The Hub
and craft a farming talisman
(5 Hay Bales + 4 Seeds)
